name: Rocket Crane
description:
Rockets are cool...
Cranes are cool...
How about a Rocket powered Crane?...Bring it on!

Master the art of flying a Rocket Crane, then use your skill to solve complex construction puzzles.

* 10 challenging levels (100 in full version)
* Build anything you like in the Sandbox
* See if you can break the tallest structure record in the Tallest Challenge.

If you enjoy the free version, you can upgrade to the full version with a simple in-app-purchase. This is what you get:

* All 100 levels
* Unlimited Sandbox objects
* Unlimited Tallest Challenge objects
* 5000 free coins
